trans-unit.source: Provides a method that when implemented, resolves a latitude/longitude location to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um método que, quando implementado, resolve um local de latitude/longitude para um endereço civil.

trans-unit.source: To resolve a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> to a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> asynchronously, implement <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>, and provide the civic address data to the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Para resolver um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> para um <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> assincronamente, implementar <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>e fornecer os dados de endereço civil para o <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
trans-unit.target: O local da latitude/longitude para resolver para um endereço.

trans-unit.source: Resolves a <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Resolve um <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> para um endereço civil de maneira síncrona.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
trans-unit.target: O local da latitude/longitude para resolver para um endereço.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to resolve a latitude/longitude location to an address.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma solicitação para resolver um local de latitude/longitude para um endereço.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous request using <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> to resolve a latitude/longitude to a civic address is complete.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma solicitação assíncrona usando <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> para resolver uma latitude/longitude para um endereço civil é concluída.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> and handle the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como chamar <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> e tratar o <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> evento.
